author: pintail_xyz
content:
Hello! I'm writing an article about eth2 validator rewards/penalties (current draft here: https://github.com/pintail-xyz/validator_rewards/blob/main/validator_rewards.ipynb). I wanted to include a quick mention of the incentive changes coming in Altair. Is there a summary of these changes anywhere?

My current understanding of the changes is:
1. inclusion delay reward removed, with only attestations included in the next block being counted
2. proportion of total per-epoch reward allocated to block proposer increased from 1/32 to 1/8
3. overall per-epoch max issuance unchanged, so the source/target/head rewards will change to keep this invariant

Is that right?
